page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: Thorpe's population is 792 and alot of the population consists of farmers. There are{five farms}surrounding Thorpe.They are Ansons Farm in Morton,Whitewell Farm and Scotland Farm in Eagle Barnsdale,Sky Barn and Thorpe Grange near Aubourn.Thorpe Grange is not just a farm it is also a riding school and they also graze cattle and grow crops.The other farms grow barley and corn and also graze cattle ,a lot of the land is occupied by woodland. There aren't any farms in Thorpe but years ago Thorpe used to have nearly all farms and farm cottages.There are a few original farms and farm cottages still standing.There is also a pig farm.
